name: Legend of the Holy shovel
description:
You are working a late shift digging graves one night, when zombies start rising from the ground.   Dig, smash or blast your way through with your shovel!  

Controlls: Hit with shovel head for melee or to destroy dirt blocks

Left Trackpad Click / Left Joystick Click = Teleport

Right Trackpad Position/ Right Joystick position= Slide movement

Right Trigger = Fire holy beam from cross

Holy hand grenades can be grabbed by left trigger if over belt.

Made for VRJam2020 by a team of four

Please try it out and leave a rating!
